title: Strawberries and cream swiss roll
ingredients: ['For the swiss roll', '3 eggs', '200g caster sugar', '80ml hot water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125g plain flour, sifted', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'a few tablespoons icing sugar for dusting', 'For the strawberry and cream filling', '150g fresh strawberries, chopped', '235ml whipping cream', '1 teaspoon (2 or 3g) powdered gelatine', '1 tablespoon caster sugar']
